Articles.Content: Just a Skin I made that i feel is more appealing than the big yellow stripes.
I like it. Its gives an official feel about it with the logo applied.

Greetings.

Interesting looking patch/modification to the game.

As one of the assistants that post things to the Repository, I'd like to include it. Or even better, suggest that you put it in the repository yourself. The repository is located here: http://www.kerbalspacerepository.com

The problem is, as presented, the skin is not 'packaged'. May I point you to this post here: Installing Mods... in particular the correct folder structure. If you could package this skin in the correct folder, it would save a whole tonne of hassles. 8) :thumbup: If you can't no worries, myself or the Repo Mods will do it for you, just saves us a bit of work.

Shader
help yourself with it. I have no idea how to put it in the repository?

Thanks.

To post to the repository, you first go to it and follow the link at the top of the page 'How to add your own content' and follow the directions there.

Not to worry. You can find your Parachute: Here Thanks for your addition.

Regards,

Shader
